title: My club disappeared for me and me only
body:
Hi! 
I've come across an unusual problem with the club tags. Well, with the club as well. I've created one, 2 months ago and everything was fine until 2 weeks ago: it won't show anymore. It is as if I didn't have a club (even though I'm the owner of said club) and my tag won't show either. I thought it was weird so I asked my club members and they still see me in the club with the tag and all... I've tried login off and on and nothing worked. Any ideas? 
Thanks

replies.body: We' have some club issue since it was restored that we're currently tracking and figuring out.  Reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), so we can look into your issue individual and track it for our club devs.  For troubleshooting purposes, in your ticket include someone you'd be okay with making club owner temporarily.  We'll respond as soon as possible!
